storyInfo: After Jesselton's meticulous planning, Anthony is slowly beaten. And as the prison break looks doomed to fail, Saria arrives in the nick of time.

attributes.content: Son of a...!
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: It's no use, Anthony.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Ms. Robin, I'm afraid I've underestimated your fighting prowess. I must say, I'm taking a liking to you more and more by the minute.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: How about it? Help me now, and I will forgive all that you've done.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: How about no?!
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: What's with this guy's hand? It's got so hard after it turned black!
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Oh, let me introduce you to my Originium Arts. I can control iron. And I've also received a few modifications to my body.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: When you attacked just now, it felt as though you hit an iron plate, didn't it?
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: That isn't just my Originium Arts at work.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Beneath my skin, I have what I suppose you can aptly call the crystallization of technology, courtesy of Rhine Lab—a tiny metal plating.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Well, I'm afraid I don't know what its proper name is, but it's strong enough to greatly reduce the impact of your attacks.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Hold on, you're from Rhine Lab?!
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Unfortunately, I'm not.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: In any case, I'm surprised you're able to put up such a fight despite those shackles.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Looks like it's time to get serious.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: His hand... turned into a blade...
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Did you know, Mr. Anthony?
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Ever since I arrived at the prison, ever since I first laid my eyes on you, I've felt a sort of mismatch.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: You are doing your damnedest to control yourself, to make yourself seem harmless, and to make yourself look well-mannered.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: But you're strength incarnate.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: From that moment onward, I've been waiting for this to happen.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: So that I can tear off that well-mannered facade of yours and unleash the violence hidden underneath—
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: I'm sure I didn't disappoint.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Not at all. You opened my eyes.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: You have no right to judge who I am!!! *Roar*!!!
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: I'm not here to judge. What I'm trying to say is you're much less of an eyesore now.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Using your teeth too, huh? Tsk, tsk.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: I'm sorry to say your teeth won't be able to tear into me.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: ...Dammit! Dammit!
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Anthony, my friend, is there really all that much you can accomplish outside?
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Will you be able to save your parents? Your family?
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Let me tell you. You'll have nothing once you step out there.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: You're living quite the life here in prison. Even the warden has to kowtow to you.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: I may have said I could've killed you long ago, but it wouldn't have been a walk in the park if you didn't go on this little excursion.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Why go through all that trouble? Isn't life in prison plenty comfortable?
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: On July 24th six years ago, I was heading to a dinner party when, all of a sudden, a bodyguard told me something had happened back home and my father told me to run.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: I had no idea what had happened. I didn't even had the chance to say goodbye to my parents before I went on the run.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: I was arrested when I made it to Ironforge.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: I thought that was all there was to it, but it didn't take long after I was put in prison for me to find out that wasn't the case.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: The way I'm treated here is not how criminals are usually treated. I realized right away that my father probably arranged for my imprisonment.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Well, what a coincidence. I think so too. But if that's what you think, wouldn't you say that's all the more reason not to betray your father's wishes?
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: My father's wishes?
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Looks like you really enjoy looking down on people and trying to plot them out, Jesselton.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Has anyone ever told you how petty you are?
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: I've been told that before, indeed.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: But I'm afraid how petty I am has nothing to do with your prison break.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: I could live a comfortable life here. I could even turn it into my own little kingdom.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: But what would that get me? It would only make me the prisoner with the most freedom.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: I've lived here for six years, and there was nary a moment when I didn't want to step outside.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: I want to leave not because I want to prove how amazing I am. I want to leave because I need to figure out just what had happened back home. I need to tell the ones responsible for my family's downfall that we're not done yet!
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: To tell the truth, that impassioned speech is really rubbing me the wrong way.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: But no big deal. Whatever the case may be, you aren't getting out of this place alive.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: I may not be able to take you down, but I've stalled you long enough. The other guards should be here soon as the lockdown ends, too.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: You did well. Your friends did, too. This isn't your fault.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: It's just that most of life in this world ends up unsatisfactory.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Unfortunately, this is as far as you go.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Listen. Here comes the reaper.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: So this is it...?
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Tsk, what should we do...?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Sorry to disappoint, but the reaper isn't coming just yet.
On a different note, Anthony, you are way too loud. I could hear you on my way here.
Who... are you?
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Hm? You...
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: I have to hand it to you. Even I was a little surprised by your plan.
It took me a good while to stop those other guards.
Huh? Where've I seen you before...?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Hold on, you...
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Rhine Lab Defense Director, Saria!
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Right, I remember you, Jesselton.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: I'm honored to be remembered by someone as esteemed as you.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Not a lot of resumes make it to my desk.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: I remember the moment you told me I didn't get the job too.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: But first, I'm curious. What is Her Highness the Defense Director doing here in a prison?
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: You needn't worry about that.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: All you need to know is that this is where it all ends for you.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Where it ends for me?
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: No, no, no. It seems you're mistaken about something, Director Saria, or should I say just Saria?
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: I heard your ability isn't all that dissimilar to mine, but before I even had the chance to find out, you'd already slammed the door in my face.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: For all these years, I've wondered whether you're actually stronger than me.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Looks like we have the chance to find out now.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Her hand changed color too!
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: It's so white... beautiful...
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: You're right. Your Arts are rather similar to mine.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: However...
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.text: Their clashes echo through the morgue.
Saria's two knife hands may seem like no match for the black blades of Jesselton.
But that couldn't be further from the truth.
After each and every strike, Jesselton can't help but take a few steps back.
There isn't a single scratch on Saria's knives.

attributes.content: I've told you before, Jesselton.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: You're too fixated on the moment and you lack perseverance. I don't need anyone like that working for me.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: You're too small-minded.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.text: —With Saria's side swipe, a crack appears on Jesselton's blade.
Jesselton has no room to attack. All he can do is to keep defending.

attributes.content: Dammit...
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: If this is how you are, there's no way I could accept your application.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Out of the way.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Saria!!!
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: I told you to get out of the way.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.text: Saria lands a final strike, breaking Jesselton's blade in two, leaving a narrow, deep cut across his body.

attributes.content: S-So strong...
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: I heard the Defense Director was pretty badass, but this is on another level...
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Thank God I've never crossed her.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Thank you very much, M-Ms. Saria.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: It's okay. If you can still walk, now's the time to do it.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Before that, I have a question I need to ask you, Anthony Simon.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Please. Go ahead.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Have you heard the name Ferdinand before?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Ferdinand... I heard that name from my father.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: So it was you, Ferdinand.
attributes.name: Saria
